body.p: The 2018 Conceptual Framework includes a discussion of the factors to consider when determining which unit of account to use. The Board did not rank the factors by priority because their relative importance depends on the specific features of the item for which the entity is accounting. In the Boardâ€™s view, no single ranking could be used to determine the most useful unit of account consistently for a broad range of Standards.
